definition: the top/above/overhead/upwards/the top margin/above-mentioned/those higher up
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
suffix of a noun of locality
erhua variant of 上邊|上边[shang4 bian5]

sentences.english: This is at the very top of the left-hand column.
You just look at what's to the left, and what's above the given position.
sentences.chinese: 你只用看看这个元素位置的左边和上边。

sentences.english: I saw it when they had the cover off, and it was right where it was supposed to be.
sentences.chinese: 我看到他们装上边盖时，它的位置没有问题。

sentences.english: So I drawn a rough diagram at top right there.
sentences.chinese: 我在这上边画了个大致的草图。

sentences.english: Hand in hand, they talked while walking along the embankment.
sentences.chinese: 他们拉着手在坝子上边走边说。

sentences.english: My wife, Elaine, appears at the top of the stairs, an inscrutable expression on her face.
sentences.chinese: 我的妻子伊莱恩站在楼梯最上边，脸上表情莫测。

sentences.english: Actually the star just at the top is the lefthand star in Orion.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，上边那颗星就是猎户座中左侧的一颗星。

sentences.english: We clicked adult at top left this time and now this.
sentences.chinese: 这次我们点击了左上边的按钮。

sentences.english: We took supper and champagne and ate and drank on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 我们带着晚餐和香槟，在草地上边吃边喝。

sentences.english: And we hope to be able to transition them to other kinds of digital work after that.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望之后能够让他们过渡到别的数字工作上边来。

sentences.english: First we spread on the floor one waterproof cape and covered it with one military greatcoat.
sentences.chinese: 先在地板上铺上防水斗篷然后在上边盖上军大衣。

sentences.english: He sat in his golden throne reading and nodding his head.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在金色的龙椅上边看书边点头。

sentences.english: Open the schedule book on the second page and write the present month and year at the top.
sentences.chinese: 在日程笔记的第二页，在最上边写下当前的月份和年。

sentences.english: Q. Why do Chelsea fans whistle whilst sitting on the toilet?
sentences.chinese: 为什么车子球迷喜欢边坐在马桶上边吹口哨？

sentences.english: The buckle of his leather stock was under his left ear instead of at the nape of his neck.
sentences.chinese: 他皮领的钮扣不在他颈后，而在他左耳上边。

sentences.english: Put this book on top of the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这本书放在其他书的上边。

definition: left/the left side/to the left of
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/proximity/thread (of ideas, plots etc)/see also 邊|边[bian1]
